DOC.brief_summary: This Phase 1 study healthy subject evaluate safety tolerability LY2811376 single dos , body handle drug , drug 's effect body .
DOC.brief_title: A Safety Study LY2811376 Single Doses Healthy Subjects
DOC.detailed_description: This Phase 1 study 2 part , healthy subject . Part 1 subject- investigator-blind , placebo-controlled , randomize , 3 period , crossover study . Part 1 assess safety tolerability LY2811376 single dos , body handle drug , drug 's effect body . Part 2 subject- investigator-blind , placebo-controlled , randomize study ass safety tolerability LY2811376 single dose , body handle drug , drug 's effect body include cerebrospinal fluid .
DOC.criteria: Healthy men nonchildbearing potential woman 20 year old Body mass index 1832kg/m2 Taking overthecounter prescription medication exception vitamins mineral stable dos thyroid estrogen hormone replacement . Smoke 10 cigarette per day . Consume 5 cup coffee per day .
